Posts.Content: Nerve damage. You should mention these symptoms to your doctor.
Posts.Title: What is all this strangeness going on!!

Posts.Content: I had non'puerperal mastitis about ten years ago. To my knowledge, IBC does not involve abscess formation or bacterial infection. If your lab results came back positive for Staphylococcus, that's what it is.
Posts.Title: Nonpuerperal breast infection with no "wound", possibly IBC, HELP!

Posts.Content: I don't mean to scare you or anything, but this could be serious, so take my advice and go see a specialist.
Posts.Title: What is all this strangeness going on!!
